title: ‘Twitter Data Dash’ is a new game to help users level up their privacy
content:
Twitter has launched a new browser game to help explain its new Privacy Policy to users. It’s certainly a unique way of sharing what could be seen as boring yet important information to its millions of users.

more…

The post ‘Twitter Data Dash’ is a new game to help users level up their privacy appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Twitter has launched a new browser game called 'Twitter Data Dash' to help explain its privacy settings to users.
